description:
My place is 
1)!close to the J Train, 
2) Minutes from Manhattan, 
3) Close to the supermarket, Laundry & other stores. 

You’ll love my place because of the LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!!! 

 My place is good for COUPLES, , People who LOVE TO  COOK, adventurers, business travelers, families and big groups.

Original Detail, (2) Fire Places, Full Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances, central heat, AC, Newly renovated bathrooms, & relaxing Backyard with Rock Garden.

WIFI 
CABLE TV 
BACKYARD 
WINE 
WATER 
COFFEE 
TOWELS 
TOILETRIES

I'll be around if you need me, but you won't see me if you don't want to.

Minutes from the train & minutes from Lower Manahttan. Plenty of stores & restaurants in the area.

The J train Kosciuszko Stop (to Manhattan or transfer to L train ) 
B38 Bus 
Q24 Bus 
B 46 Bus
name: GREAT APT 1 MINUTE WALK TO TRAIN!!!
review:
Dicht bij metro J lijn.!!!!  Wel 3 kwartier reizen naar bijvoorbeeld  Times Squares. Helaas weinig restaurantjes in directe omgeving. Bedankt voor de wijn en het water. 
2 bedden met harde matra en 1 luchtbed welke langzaam leeg liep. Goede locatie om met New Yorkers in gesprek te komen en beter beeld te krijgen van Brooklyn.  Goede prijs kwaliteit.
